Project.name: ActionScript 2 - Standard Version
Project.Description: PureMVC is a lightweight framework for creating applications based upon the classic Model-View-Controller design meta-pattern. This is the specific implementation for the ActionScript 2 language. See the Release Notes for this version for differences from the reference implementation.
